list_definition.definition: a type of edible fruit which is used as a garnish etc and which gives oil used for cooking

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He put an olive in her cocktail

list_definition.definition: the tree on which it grows
(also olive-green) the brownish-green or yellowish-green colour/color of the fruit

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: (also adjective) She wore an olive-green hat.

list_definition.definition: (also olive-wood) the wood of the tree.
